Get ready for a rebound in gas prices as OPEC has just agreed to cut oil production by 1.5 millions barrels a day. It should be noted that Iran and Venezuela have led the charge to decrease production, as their economies depend on higher oil prices. I'm just waiting for energy independence... it is a shame I'll be waiting a very very long time... Source: Truly Newsworthy, Truly Newsworthy - Breaking U.S., International, Political and Economic News
